mapper.select: SELECT a.MD_ID ,a.MD_CCUSTOMERID ,a.MD_CTABLENAME ,a.MD_NTABLESEQ ,a.MD_CCOLUMNNAME ,a.MD_CCOLUMNDESCJA ,a.MD_CCOLUMNDESCEN ,a.MD_CCOLUMNDESCCH ,a.MD_CCOLUMNDESC01 ,a.MD_CCOLUMNDESC02 ,a.MD_CTYPEOFCOLUMN ,a.MD_CEXCEPTEDDATATYPE ,a.MD_NSEQ ,a.MD_CLEVELID ,a.MD_CMASTERTBLNAME ,a.MD_CAVLFORAXESINCR ,a.MD_CAVLFORCTNINCR ,a.MD_CAVLFORCONDITIONINCR ,a.MD_CAVLGROUPS ,a.MD_CAVLFORCKSTART ,a.MD_CFULLTEXTFLG ,a.MD_CRESULTAPPID ,a.MD_CCALCULATECOLUMN ,a.MD_CMASTTBLCOLUMN ,a.MD_CMATCHESWITH ,a.VERSIONNO ,NVL(b.DATA_LENGTH,0) as DATA_LENGTH ,NVL(b.DATA_PRECISION,0) as DATA_PRECISION ,NVL(b.DATA_SCALE,0) as DATA_SCALE ,NVL(b.CHAR_LENGTH,0) as CHAR_LENGTH ,NVL(b.NULLABLE,'Y') as NULLABLE FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY a ,USER_TAB_COLUMNS b WHERE MD_CTABLENAME = TABLE_NAME(+) AND MD_CCOLUMNNAME = COLUMN_NAME(+) /* 実テーブルにカラムがないと転けるので暫定対応 konno MAST_DATADICTIONARY a LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS b ON a.MD_CTABLENAME = b.TABLE_NAME AND a.MD_CCOLUMNNAME = b.COLUMN_NAME */ /* MAST_DATADICTIONARY ,USER_TAB_COLUMNS WHERE MD_CTABLENAME = TABLE_NAME AND MD_CCOLUMNNAME = COLUMN_NAME */

SELECT DISTINCT ' AND ' || 'HD_CCUSTOMERID_CK = ' || CUSTOMERID || ' AND ' || 'HD_CUSERID = ' || USERID || ' AND ' || 'HD_DSTARTDATE_CK <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)' || ' AND ' || 'HD_DENDDATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)' || ' AND ' || STARTDATE || ' <= TRUNC(SYSDATE)' || ' AND ' || ENDDATE || ' >= TRUNC(SYSDATE)' AS JOINQUERY FROM ( SELECT ( SELECT MD_CCOLUMNNAME FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = /*psCustomerId*/'01' AND MD_CTABLENAME = /*psTableId*/'TEST' AND MD_CCOLUMNNAME LIKE '%CCUSTOMERID%' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS CUSTOMERID, ( SELECT MD_CCOLUMNNAME FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = /*psCustomerId*/'01' AND MD_CTABLENAME = /*psTableId*/'TEST' AND MD_CCOLUMNNAME LIKE '%DSTARTDATE%' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS STARTDATE, ( SELECT MD_CCOLUMNNAME FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = /*psCustomerId*/'01' AND MD_CTABLENAME = /*psTableId*/'TEST' AND MD_CCOLUMNNAME LIKE '%DENDDATE%' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS ENDDATE, ( SELECT MD_CCOLUMNNAME FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = /*psCustomerId*/'01' AND MD_CTABLENAME = /*psTableId*/'TEST' AND MD_CCOLUMNNAME LIKE '%CUSERID%' AND ROWNUM = 1 ) AS USERID FROM DUAL )

-- 使用出来るテーブル一覧を取得 SELECT DISTINCT MDT_CTABLENAME AS code_info, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_TABLE_DESC('${customerId}',MDT_CTABLENAME,'${language}') AS name_info, MDT_NTABLESEQ FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY, MAST_DATADICTBL WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId}
AND MD_CAVLFORCKSTART = '1'
AND MD_CAVLGROUPS = '1'
AND MD_CCUSTOMERID = MDT_CCUSTOMERID AND MD_CTABLENAME = MDT_CTABLENAME ORDER BY MDT_NTABLESEQ,MDT_CTABLENAME

SELECT DISTINCT MD_CCOLUMNNAME AS code_info, PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_TABLE_DESC('${customerId}',MD_CTABLENAME,'${language}') || '－' || PSMASTER.FUNC_GET_COLUMN_DESC('${customerId}','${tableId}',MD_CCOLUMNNAME,'${language}') AS name_info, MD_CMASTERTBLNAME AS MASTERINFO, MD_CTYPEOFCOLUMN AS TYPEINFO, MD_NSEQ FROM MAST_DATADICTIONARY WHERE MD_CCUSTOMERID = #{customerId} AND MD_CTABLENAME = #{tableId}
AND MD_CAVLFORCKSTART = '1'
AND MD_CAVLGROUPS = '1'
ORDER BY MD_NSEQ
